Title: Relates to establishing a lithium-ion battery safety program
Summary: Provides that NYSERDA shall establish a program to provide rebates or new lithium-ion batteries for powered mobility devices at reduced cost or no cost to certain individuals; sets standards for lithium-ion batteries provided pursuant to the program; requires NYSERDA to submit an annual report on such program.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to establishing a lithium-ion battery safety program
